entry.title: Raxa JSS EMR how to contribute
entry.summary:
For all those who are interested in Projects in the category HFOSSHumanitarian Foss here is an opportunity to hack around and do your bit its fairly simple

We sometimes hang out in #raxa on Freenode (Chat here: https://webchat.freenode.net/).

  • GitHub
  • Github Help
  • Git... for people who know â€¦
entry.content:
For all those who are interested in Projects in the category HFOSSHumanitarian Foss here is an opportunity to hack around and do your bit its fairly simple

We sometimes hang out in #raxa on Freenode (Chat here: https://webchat.freenode.net/).

  • GitHub
  • Github Help
  • Git... for people who know SVN
  • Fork a Github Repro https://help.github.com/fork-a-repo/
  • Send a Pull Request https://help.github.com/send-pull-requests/
  • View all of our developers' code which has been forked from Raxa-JSS: https://github.com/Raxa/Raxa-JSS/network/members
  • Sencha (JavaScript framework)
    • Sencha Touch 2.0 (mobile) Official docs
    • Sencha Tutorials
    • Writing a Sencha Touch 1.1 Application
    • Writing a Sencha Touch MVC Application
    • Writing a Sencha Touch 2.0 Application
  • ExtJS (desktop) Official docs
  • Application Architecture in ExtJS4
  • List of tutorials: https://imwill.com/sencha-touch-tutorials/
  • Videos
    • SenchaCon 2011: MVC in Depth Part 1 https://vimeo.com/33311074 (Sencha 2)
    • SenchaCon 2011: MVC in Depth Part 2 https://vimeo.com/33430731 (Sencha 2)
    • SenchaCon 2011: The Sencha Class System https://vimeo.com/33437222
  • Jasmine (JavaScript testing)
    • Homepage https://pivotal.github.com/jasmine/ and wiki https://github.com/pivotal/jasmine/wiki
    • Tutorial: https://evanhahn.com/?p=181
    • Using Jasmine with Sencha: https://docs.sencha.com/ext-js/4-0/#!/guide/testing
